results.name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 690 / RX 480 (3GB+ of VRAM)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / RX 5700 XT (5GB+ of VRAM)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
